thread.title: 'Hoverboard' scooters are illegal on pavement and roads, warn prosecutors
thread.title_full: 'Hoverboard' scooters are illegal on pavement and roads, warn prosecutors

author: David Barrett
title: 'Hoverboard' scooters are illegal on pavement and roads, warn prosecutors
text: Technology News 'Hoverboard' scooters are illegal to ride in public, Crown Prosecution Service says The electric self-balancing scooters must adhere to the same rules as Segways, meaning they cannot be ridden on roads or pavements Hoverboard scooters have become massively popular
